thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com | 14 of 183
thread.title: Ki

author: Ki
title: Ki
text:
I ordered this hair on a Friday, and received my package within a few days the following week, for me - this was the best delivery experience EVER!
Now, when I got the hair, I was a bit disappointed in the quality... I know it's synthetic, but it seemed to already have some frizz-action going on. I just hope it lasts...
Just got them installed today, and I love the length (it comes down to my bra) they are so cute, can't wait to show the world! Lol.
